questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Fallen tree and grass around it

B) A sports event
C) A discarded or fallen Christmas tree
D) A family gathering

A) A group of people
B) An animal
C) A fallen tree
D) A building

A) A person
B) A tree
C) A building
D) A car

A) A beach
B) A forest
C) Bushes and plants
D) A mountain

A) A lake
B) A sidewalk
C) Grass and fallen leaves
D) A street

B) Dry and brown
